reviewText: I enjoyed both of these movies years ago and couldn't wait to order them and add them to my collection. Both very enjoyableand entertaining.
Title: Footloose / Flashdance

reviewText: I have enjoyed watching Footloose and Flashdance over and over again - we have had movie marathon and these two are always a part of it.
Title: Footloose / Flashdance

reviewText: What a terrific way to get both of the awesome dance films.  Great value for the money and two wonderfulo films for my library.
Title: Footloose / Flashdance

reviewText: The word dance is what links Footloose and Flashdance.Footloose is about a young teen boy who moves from a city to a very small town where popular music and dancing are not allowed.The movie follows his struggles to fit in with an environment that it totally foreign to him and the resulting effect he has on this rigidunhappy town.Flashdance is an entertaining movie built around the life of a young girl who longs to go to a dance institute but has no qualifications to get in.  She struggles as a dancer in a nightclub while her heart seeks the ballet.If you like music, dancing, romance, you'll like this movie
Title: Footloose / Flashdance

reviewText: really good 80s dance movies I grew up watching these thanks to my mom but I love them and prefer them other any 2012/13 movies !!! its a great deal because your getting two movies !!!
Title: Footloose / Flashdance

reviewText: With the current trend on TV of bringing dance to popularity, it's refreshing to go back to classics.
summary: Classics still work after all these years
Title: Footloose / Flashdance

reviewText: Footloose is and has been a great dance classic.  Bacon and Lithgow make the story, and the music is good, even now.  Flashdance was a good movie about fulfilling one's dreams.
Title: Footloose / Flashdance

reviewText: These movies were ok. I love dancing movies and these weren't any different but I've seen better. Good acting and just ok!
Title: Footloose / Flashdance

reviewText: I had never seen footloose but had seen flashdance.  I loved both movies and now own them on dvd.  I think they are great
Title: Footloose / Flashdance

reviewText: I haven't yet looked at the Flashdance portion of this DVD, but Footloose is a very poor transfer. There is dirt and spots throughout the film and most scenes are very soft and blurry. At least it's presented in anamorphic widescreen.
Title: Footloose / Flashdance

reviewText: These are movies you can never see too much of, good music, dancing and ones that take me back to the Good Old Days, maks me want to dance and i've got 2 left feet.
Title: Footloose / Flashdance

reviewText: These two movies together are two of my favorite movies. Footloose and Flash dance being  together are great! Thanks Ken
Title: Footloose / Flashdance

reviewText: These are two of the 80's classic movies.  We really like Flash dance, Footloose has good music.  That about it
Title: Footloose / Flashdance

reviewText: I wanted to buy both of these movies and when I saw them in a double feature I was very excited. Perfect condition and came quickly! great purchase
Title: Footloose / Flashdance

reviewText: Great music...you can't sit still while any of it is playing.  You will have to get up and dance around.  Kevin Bacon was fabulous in this movie.
Title: Footloose / Flashdance

reviewText: What can I say about these two great 80's movies. It just brings back awesome memories & are two classics for sure. Wonderful idea to put these two together.
Title: Footloose / Flashdance

reviewText: I can't believe I grew up and never watched these two movies. Specially being a movie freak.... lol. It wasn't till my hubby bought this disc from Walmart that I finally got to watch these movies. I enjoyed them both a lot. Made me want to get up and start dancing.... lol.
Title: Footloose / Flashdance
